mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FAQ (FAQ_ID, TITLE, CONTENT, MEMBER_ID) VALUES (#{FAQ_ID}, #{TITLE}, #{CONTENT}, #{member.MEMBER_ID})
mapper.select: SELECT FAQ_ID, TITLE, CONTENT FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY FAQ_ID DESC) AS RN, FAQ_ID, TITLE, CONTENT FROM FAQ ) WHERE RN > (#{pageNum} -1) * #{amount} AND RN <= #{pageNum} * #{amount}
